code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import{getDirectores}from"../../services/api";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import'../../styles/global.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const DirectoresList=()=>{const[directores,setDirectores]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{getDirectores().then(setDirectores);},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"p-6",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex items-center justify-between mb-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-2xl font-bold",children:"Lista de Directores"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/directores/agregar",className:"btn-agregar",children:"+ Agregar Directores"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"border rounded p-4",children:directores.map(director=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:"border-b py-2 flex justify-between items-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:[director.nombres," - ",director.estado," (",director.fecha_creacion,")"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:`/directores/editar/${director.id}`,className:"btn-actualizarlist",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fas fa-edit"})," Actualizar"]})]},director.id))})]});};export default DirectoresList;
